# XML Literals

- [XML Literals](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/index.md): Learn more about: XML Literals (Visual Basic)
- [XML CDATA Literal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-cdata-literal.md): Learn more about: XML CDATA Literal (Visual Basic)
- [XML Comment Literal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-comment-literal.md): Learn more about: XML Comment Literal (Visual Basic)
- [XML Document Literal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-document-literal.md): Learn more about: XML Document Literal (Visual Basic)
- [XML Element Literal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-element-literal.md): Learn more about: XML Element Literal (Visual Basic)
- [XML Processing Instruction Literal](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/llmstxt/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/xml-literals/xml-processing-instruction-literal.md): Learn more about: XML Processing Instruction Literal (Visual Basic)
